message: It's really rough, but I've started something that allows for automatic activate/deactivate of virtualenvs
and when you cd into that directory or it's children, it'll auto-activate. When you leave the dir, it deactivates.
you create a `.workon` file in your project dir with the path of the env you want to activate

@kennethreitz Justin Lily did some similar work. You might want to collaborate with him. http://www.doughellmann.com/docs/virtualenvwrapper/tips.html#automatically-run-workon-when-entering-a-directory
just tried jlily's code, and it seems to break when using distribute, causing some sort of loop.  I had to alias it to cdv instead of cd, then it works
